root.title: AD Groups Or Users Enumeration Using PowerShell - ScriptBlock
root.description: Adversaries may attempt to find domain-level groups and permission settings. The knowledge of domain-level permission groups can help adversaries determine which groups exist and which users belong to a particular group. Adversaries may use this information to determine which users have elevated permissions, such as domain administrators.
root.author: frack113

logsource.definition: Requirements: Script Block Logging must be enabled
